== Bapere (565944) ==

Bapere is a village in the [[Lanja]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 796.75 hectares and harbouring 200 households with total population of 752 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Rajapur]] is at a distance of 50 km. Male population is 306 and female population is 446. Scheduled Caste Population is 140 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 565944<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
